name: Love Therapy
overview: Love Therapy is a dating simulation game that features 3 modes: - Love Story: Try to fall in love with one of the 12 girls. There are different locations to go and things to buy for her. To advance in the game the player got to have a succeed day with the girl or he will have to go through it again and again... To have a succeed date the player has to answer different questions that the girl will ask him and take her to places that she will like. - Therapy: Different questions to know your personality - Catalog: A gallery of images of different places of the game.
